title: All Eyes on the Fed Heading Into Wednesday's Decision
itunes:title: All Eyes on the Fed Heading Into Wednesday's Decision
description:
Bloomberg News Federal Reserve Reporter Matt Boesler explains why the Fed’s employment mandate is taking a back seat in the effort to fight inflation. Bloomberg Businessweek Columnist Max Chafkin provides the details of his Businessweek Magazine story Can an Election-Denial Alliance Save Republican Senate Hopes in Arizona? Carl Riccadonna, Chief US Economist at BNP Paribas, shares his thoughts on Fed policy ahead of Wednesday's rate decision. And we Drive to the Close with Amanda Agati, Chief Investment Officer at PNC Asset Management Group.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
